description:
Yoko joins a rebel to defeat Shoko.  The rebel break up Shoko’s 3000 soldiers by raiding one of Shoko’s houses and storage first, leaving the letter “Shu-on”(meaning Death-to-Shoko.)  Kantai and Shokei hear about the revolt and they’re worried about Gaho’s support for Shoko.  Yoko and the rebel raid Shoko’s another house as a decoy, and Yoko runs into Asano there.  Now that Asano is with Shoko, Yoko decides to stick with her mission as a queen, leaves him and goes to Shoko’s Go Castle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 13
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juusan Shou
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 13
風の万里 黎明の空 十三章
